item.description:
Retirement, Social Security, and You?

Hosted By:
Alexandre M. Oliveira, CRPC, Financial Advisor, Ameriprise
Joseph Walsh, Senior Vice President, Fidelity Investments Institutional Services

Steven Richardson, Social Security, Director of New England , Deputy Communications


How comfortable are you answering these questions?

How comfortable are you that you will be able to re-create your paycheck in retirement?
How comfortable are you that you will have the means to realize your dreams?
How much can you withdraw at retirement without running out of money?
How do you appropriately navigate a turbulent market?
How will health care costs affect your retirement lifestyle in the future?
How much of your retirement income will come from social security?
How would your future lifestyle be affected if social security vanished?
How would a divorce, spousal death, or pension affect your social security benefit?

Are you having difficulty answering some, if not, all of these questions? Would it be worth making sure that you can answer all of them with certainty?

If so, then come join us at this informative dinner:

Date: Tuesday, June 24, 2008
Time: 7:00 p.m.
Place: PapaRazzi Trattoria, 2 Wall Street, Burlington, MA
item.why: Free meal, informal, can ask any questions, and lots of laughs!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Retirement and You
